trans-unit.source: Note: The content item is automatically positioned and resized to fit within the padding of the control. Bindings to the x, y, width, and height properties of the contentItem are not respected.
trans-unit.target: 注意：内容项将自动定位并调整大小以适合控件的填充。不遵守对contentItem的x，y，width和height属性的绑定。

trans-unit.source: Note: The content item is automatically positioned and resized to fit within the padding of the control. Bindings to the x, y, width, and height properties of the contentItem are not respected.
trans-unit.target: 注意：内容项将自动定位并调整大小以适合控件的填充。不遵守对contentItem的x，y，width和height属性的绑定。

trans-unit.source: Note: The content item is automatically resized to fit within the padding of the popup.
trans-unit.target: 注意：内容项会自动调整大小以适合弹出窗口的填充。

trans-unit.source: Note: The contents of
trans-unit.target: 注意：内容

trans-unit.source: Note: The context and the framebuffer object used by the widget changes when reparenting the widget via setParent().
trans-unit.target: 注意：当通过setParent（）对窗口小部件进行父级化时，窗口小部件使用的上下文和framebuffer对象会发生变化。

trans-unit.source: Note: The context and the framebuffer object used by the widget changes when reparenting the widget via setParent(). In addition, the framebuffer object changes on each resize.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当通过setParent（）对窗口小部件进行父级化时，窗口小部件使用的上下文和framebuffer对象会发生变化。此外，帧缓冲区对象在每次调整大小时都会更改。

trans-unit.source: Note: The conversion of the number is performed in the default C locale, irrespective of the user's locale.
trans-unit.target: 注意：数字转换是在默认的C语言环境中进行的，与用户的语言环境无关。

trans-unit.source: Note: The conversion of the number is performed in the default C locale, regardless of the user's locale. Use QLocale to perform locale-aware conversions between numbers and strings.
trans-unit.target: 注意：数字的转换在默认的C语言环境中执行，而不管用户的语言环境如何。使用QLocale在数字和字符串之间执行可识别语言环境的转换。

trans-unit.source: Note: The cookie filter also controls other features with tracking capabilities similar to those of cookies; including IndexedDB, DOM storage, filesystem API, service workers, and AppCache.
trans-unit.target: 注意： cookie过滤器还控制其他功能，这些功能具有与cookie相似的跟踪功能。包括IndexedDB，DOM存储，文件系统API，服务工作者和AppCache。

trans-unit.source: Note: The coordinates cannot be processed in place. To change the value of this property, retrieve the complete list of coordinates, process them, and assign the new value to the property.
trans-unit.target: 注意：无法在原地处理坐标。要更改此属性的值，请检索完整的坐标列表，进行处理，然后将新值分配给该属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: The coordinates will be used for every available render surface as long as they are in the valid range.
trans-unit.target: 注意：坐标将用于每个可用的渲染表面，只要它们在有效范围内即可。

trans-unit.source: Note: The list of touchPoints() will never be partial: A touch event will always contain a touch point for each existing physical touch contacts targetting the window or widget to which the event is sent. It is up to the configuration and the application to ensure these.

trans-unit.source: Note: This constructor is only available for char array literals. The reasoning behind that is for compatibility with C-libraries which predefine "large-enough" arrays, but only use some of the preallocated space. To support this in an intuitive way in an implicit constructor overload, we need to stop at the first char(0). This is logical for a char array, but not for a std::byte array.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此构造函数仅可用于char数组文字。其背后的原因是为了与C库兼容，这些C库预定义了“足够大”的数组，但仅使用了一些预分配的空间。为了在隐式构造函数重载中以直观的方式支持此操作，我们需要在第一个 char(0) 处停止。对于char数组，这是合乎逻辑的，但对于 std::byte 数组，则不符合逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Note: This flag is not fully identical to setting the QSG_NO_DEPTH_BUFFER environment variable. This flag does not control the depth-stencil buffers' presence. It is rather relevant for the rendering pipeline. To force not having depth/stencil attachments at all, set QSG_NO_DEPTH_BUFFER and QSG_NO_STENCIL_BUFFER. Be aware however that such a QQuickWindow, and any Item layers in it, may then become incompatible with items, such as View3D with certain operating modes, because 3D content requires a depth buffer. Calling this function is always safe, but can mean that resources, such as depth buffers, are created even though they are not actively used.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此标志与设置 QSG_NO_DEPTH_BUFFER 环境变量并不完全相同。该标志不控制深度模板缓冲区的存在。它与渲染管道非常相关。要强制完全没有深度/模板附件，请设置 QSG_NO_DEPTH_BUFFER 和 QSG_NO_STENCIL_BUFFER 。但是请注意，这样的QQuickWindow以及其中的任何Item图层都可能与某些项目（例如具有某些操作模式的View3D）不兼容，因为3D内容需要深度缓冲区。调用此函数始终是安全的，但是即使未积极使用资源，也可能会创建深度缓冲区之类的资源。

trans-unit.source: Note: This function will start a local event loop. This may lead to scenarios whereby other application slots may be called while the execution of this function scope is blocking. To avoid problems, the signals for this class should not be connected to slots. Similarly this function must never be called in response to the framesReceived() or errorOccurred() signals.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此函数将启动本地事件循环。这可能会导致在此功能范围的执行被阻止的同时调用其他应用程序插槽的情况。为避免出现问题，此类的信号不应连接到插槽。同样，绝不能响应frameReceived（）或errorOccurred（）信号而调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Note: This is practically identical to QtQuick::EventPoint; however an EventPoint is a long-lived QObject which is invalidated between gestures and reused for subsequent event deliveries. Continuous bindings to its properties are not possible, and an individual handler cannot rely on it outside the period when that point is part of an active gesture which that handler is handling. HandlerPoint is a Q_GADGET that the handler owns. This allows you to make lifetime bindings to its properties.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这实际上与QtQuick :: EventPoint相同；但是，EventPoint是一个长期存在的QObject，它在手势之间无效并且可以重新用于后续事件传递。不可能对其属性进行连续绑定，并且当该点是该处理程序正在处理的活动手势的一部分时，单个处理程序无法在该时间段之外依赖它。HandlerPoint是处理程序拥有的Q_GADGET。这使您可以对其属性进行生命周期绑定。

trans-unit.source: Note: This is the last place to act with all graphics resources intact before QVulkanWindow starts releasing them. It is therefore essential that implementations with an asynchronous, potentially multi-threaded startNextFrame() perform a blocking wait and call QVulkanWindow::frameReady() before returning from this function in case there is a pending frame submission.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这是在QVulkanWindow开始释放它们之前完整处理所有图形资源的最后一个位置。因此，至关重要的是与异步实现方式中，潜在多线程startNextFrame（）执行一个阻塞等待和呼叫QVulkanWindow :: frameReady从该函数返回的情况下，存在未决的帧提交前（）。

trans-unit.source: Note: This is the last place to act with all graphics resources intact before QVulkanWindow starts releasing them. It is therefore essential that implementations with an asynchronous, potentially multi-threaded startNextFrame() perform a blocking wait and call QVulkanWindow::frameReady() before returning from this function in case there is a pending frame submission.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这是在QVulkanWindow开始释放它们之前完整处理所有图形资源的最后一个位置。因此，至关重要的是，使用异步的，可能具有多线程的startNextFrame（）的实现在从该函数返回之前执行阻塞等待并调用QVulkanWindow :: frameReady（），以防有待提交的帧提交。

trans-unit.source: Note: This method also registers the stream and debug operators for the type if they are visible at registration time. As this is done automatically in some places, it is strongly recommended to declare the stream operators for a type directly after the type itself.
